column4: Sometimes when I try to play MP3 through Rythmbox it refuses to play and if I reboot it plays them again.  any ideas on how I can sort this out?
sounds like a problem I sometimes have with sound; some application (usually flash in ff) grabs sound and won't let go.
Any idea how to sort it out?
I usually use "fuser /dev/dsp" or somesuch to find the culprit, then decide if I want to kill it or make do without sound. it's a kludge, but it's usually good enough for me.
